properties.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 2:41AM MST until January 2 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor and Central Colorado River
Basin, mainly east of Parachute.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A
detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY
